title: The Ogre’s Food Box - Novel Updates
tags: Beastkin   Demi-Humans   Demons   Depictions of Cruelty   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fantasy World   Gods   Gore   Humanoid Protagonist   Kingdoms   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Ruthless Protagonist   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Survival   Weak to Strong   World Travel
author: 黑籍
description:
Sitting in the food box, watching those all so powerful human braves, orc prophets, and wizard heroes fighting each others in a bloody fight.

Just for that dirty food and the right to survive….

He who stand above all, the king Golon who started to miss his carefree chilhood days, as well as his Mother who gave him the essence of the ogre culture.

Cooking Guide :

1. Find one or eight living people

2. Hit him or them

3. Continue to beat him or them

4. Throw him or them into the fire

5. Start eating.>
